languages.text: "Без личины Вил'Джай мне нравится больше. Но гниль без маски — все еще гниль".
"I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."
languages.original_text: "Без личины Вил'Джай мне нравится больше. Но гниль без маски — все еще гниль".

traits.locale_text: "I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."
"I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."
"I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."
"I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."
"I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."

languages.text: "Mir gefällt Vil'Jae ohne die Maske besser. Aber Fäulnis ohne Maske bleibt Fäulnis."
languages.original_text: "I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."

traits.locale_text: "Mir gefällt Vil'Jae ohne die Maske besser. Aber Fäulnis ohne Maske bleibt Fäulnis."

languages.text: « Je préfère Vil'Jae sans son masque, mais masquée ou non, la corruption reste la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère Vil'Jae sans son masque, mais masquée ou non, la corruption reste la corruption. »

languages.text: «Me gusta más la Vil'Jae sin máscara. Pero la podredumbre sin máscara no deja de ser podredumbre».
languages.original_text: "I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."

traits.locale_text: «Me gusta más la Vil'Jae sin máscara. Pero la podredumbre sin máscara no deja de ser podredumbre».

languages.text: 「仮面をしていないヴィルジェイのほうが好き。でも仮面のない腐乱でも、腐敗であることに変わりはない」
languages.original_text: "I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."

traits.locale_text: 「仮面をしていないヴィルジェイのほうが好き。でも仮面のない腐乱でも、腐敗であることに変わりはない」

languages.text: “我更喜欢敌者婕伊不戴面具的样子，但即便是不戴面具，烂了的东西也终究是烂了。”
languages.original_text: "I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."

traits.locale_text: “我更喜欢敌者婕伊不戴面具的样子，但即便是不戴面具，烂了的东西也终究是烂了。”

languages.original_text: "I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."

languages.text: "Vil'Jae'ın maskesiz hâlini tercih ederim. Ancak maske olsun olmasın, çürük çürüktür."
languages.original_text: "I like Vil'Jae better without the mask. But rot without a mask is still rot."
